definition: being at the best stage of development, an imaginary great circle on the surface of the earth passing through the north and south poles at right angles to the equator
details:
adjective
- being at the best stage of development
= synonyms: prime
- of or happening at noon
= example: of or happening at noon
noun
- an imaginary great circle on the surface of the earth passing through the north and south poles at right angles to the equator
= example: an imaginary great circle on the surface of the earth passing through the north and south poles at right angles to the equator
= synonyms: line of longitude
- the highest level or degree attainable
= synonyms: elevation
